title: Collections in Tableau
description: In this instructional video, you will learn how to utilize collections in Tableau. Topic Covered: Creating and Deleting Collections Accessing Collections Sharing Collections Putting it into Practice

title: Connecting To and Understanding Tableau
description: In this instructional video, you will learn how to connect to Tableau through Salesforce and navigate its basic organizational structure. Topics Covered: Connecting to the Tableau Server Organizational Hierarchy (Projects, Workbooks, Views) General Dashboard Layout

title: Searching and Filtering in Tableau
description: In this instructional video you will learn how to navigate the search and filter options in Tableau. Topic Covered: Scope of the Search Bar Using the Search Bar Searching from the Explore Tab Putting it into Practice

title: Favorites in Tableau
description: In this instructional video, you will learn how to use the favorites feature in Tableau. Topic Covered: Marking and Unmarking Favorites Accessing and Rearranging Favorites Putting it into Practice

title: Subscriptions in Tableau
description: In this instructional video, you will learn how to utilize Subscriptions in Tableau. Topic Covered: Creating Subscriptions Managing and Viewing Subscriptions Unsubscribing Putting it into Practice

title: Custom Views in Tableau
description: In this instructional video, you will learn how to create and access Custom Views in Tableau. Topic Covered: Creating, Saving, and Deleting Custom views Managing View Settings Tracking and Accessing Custom views Putting it into Practice

title: Sharing In Tableau
description: In this instructional video, you will learn how to share content in Tableau. Topic Covered: Sharing from a View Sharing from the Homepage Sharing Content from a Parent Folder Sharing a Project or Workbook Putting it into Practice

title: Notifications in Tableau
description: In this instructional video, you will learn how to manage notifications in Tableau. Topic Covered: Viewing Notifications Managing Notification Removing Notifications Putting it into Practice

title: Comments in Tableau
description: In this instructional video, you will learn how to create Custom Views in Tableau. Topic Covered: Adding a Comment Adding Snapshots to Comments Comment Notifications Deleting Comments Putting it into Practice

title: Downloading in Tableau
description: In this instructional video, you will learn how to Download Content from a Dashboard in Tableau. Topic Covered: Downloading Content (navigation, download options and file types)

title: Introduction to Cognos and Common Troubleshooting
description: In this instructional video, you will learn how to access and utilize Cognos. Topic Covered: Accessing Cognos Cognos Use cases

title: Navigating Through Cognos
description: In this instructional video you will learn how to navigate through Cognos. Topics Covered: Basic Navigation Setting a Custom Homepage

title: Searching for Reports in Cognos
description: In this instructional video you will learn how to Search, Save, and Filter Reports in Cognos Topics Covered: Searching in Cognos Putting it into Practice

title: Generating Reports Using Prompts in Cognos
description: In this instructional video, you will learn how to Generate reports using prompts in Cognos. Prompt Types: Value Prompt Types: Search Prompt Types: Range Running a Report

title: Saving and Sharing Reports in Cognos
description: In this instructional video, you will learn how to Save and Share reports in Cognos. Running a Report Emailing Reports

title: Generating Reports Using a Work Set in Cognos
description: In this instructional video, you will learn how to create a workset and generate Cognos reports with them. Topics Covered: Creating a Work Set Generating a Work Set in Salesforce Generating a Cognos Report Using a Workset
